title: How to write a letter to a principal for making changes in school - Quora

response.answer_text: Good question. Do not hesitate to express your thoughts. Usually, school’s like taking feedback from students. Express your thoughts and give details. Remember not to be mean and harsh. Try to express your feedback in a polite and pleasant way. Give reasons to every change you want to make. Add your personal views, if possible ask your friends and make a poll. It will help you convince the principal. Be expressive and be persuasive.
